answerText: chromatography[10] This very sensitive type of chromatography consists of forcing a sample through a chromatography column with a pump, thus increasing a certain parameter.

subject: Science
question: Question: This technique was invented by Mikhail Tsvet way back in 1906.  For 10 points each: [10] Name this technique used to separate mixtures which involves partition between a stationary phase and a mobile phase.
